basics.name: Mateo Maramara
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.S. in Computer Science in the Department of Information and Computer Sciences at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in Spring, 2026.

work.position: Informations Systems Technician/Second Class Petty Officer
highlights: Installation, maintenence, and technical support for a network of more than 300 users
Implemented security protocols and maintained technical documentation to ensure mission readiness

volunteer.summary: Collaberated with UH Manoa's 2023 as a competitor in the Collegiate Cyber Defence Competition
highlights: Collaberate with team members to identify vulnerabilities and mitigate threats
Practiced cybersecurity in real time against simulated threats

awards.title: Navy and Marine Corps Achievement Medal
awards.summary: Awarded for exceptional performance as an Information Systems Technician, demonstrating outstanding leadership, technical expertise, and dedication to mission success while maintaining the highest standards of professionalism and excellence.

awards.title: Joint Service Commendation Medal
awards.summary: Awarded for meritorious service and exceptional achievement while serving in a joint military operation, demonstrating outstanding leadership, technical expertise, and commitment to mission objectives in a high-stakes environment.
